title: Lalpa i hmangaihna vang hian
lyrics:
Lalpa, i hmangaihna vang hian,
Kan sualte min ngaidam la;
Kum ral ta hre reng lovin,
I thu thuin awm turin min pui la.
Sualnate simin, a tha chu ti turin,
Chutin kan lo pen ngil fo theih nan
Chutin kan lo pen ngil fo theih nan,
A tawp thlenga i thu zawmin.

Aw Nang, kan Lalpa leh Pathian,
He kum thar hi malsawm la;
I khawngaihna leh zahngaihna chu,
Kan chungah rawn lantir ang che.
He kum tharah hian, khawvel thil kalsana,
I duhzawng chauh ka tih fo theih nan,
I duhzawng chauh kan tih fo theih nan,
Rilru thar min rawn pe ang che.
